alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:08PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Craighead, Poinsett and northern Cross Counties through 145 PM CST... At 107 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grubbs to near McCrory. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Harrisburg, Bay, Weiner, Cherry Valley, Cash, Hickory Ridge, Waldenburg, Vanndale, Greenfield, Fisher, Hydrick, Hergett, Wiley Crossing, Apt, Birdeye, Valley View, Supply, Weona Junction and Weona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
